duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to research projects and collaborate with researchers to develop, execute, and interpret research projects.
Perform complex laboratory and data collection techniques including immunology and molecular biology related protocols, biochemistry, and medicinal chemistry.
Guide, train, and advise lower level researchers and students on techniques, methods, and procedures.
Participate in the development and maintenance of experimental protocols for animal and human samples.
Prepare and maintain human subject’s IRB protocol, drafting manuscripts, and grant applications.
Gather research data, perform biostatistical analyses, provide data interpretations, and generate narrative reports to aid in manuscript and grant preparation.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in biological sciences or related field (PhD preferred)
